intro: Blast through shapes and numbers in this addictive hand-drawn arcade shooter!
description:
Fire from a moving cannon at expanding geometric shapes like circles, squares, and triangles. Aim to hit as many as you can with a single shot, as a new shape will emerge where the fired bullet lands. Each figure displays a number indicating how many hits it takes to destroy it, so strategize your shots wisely. It's not all about a good aim, but also smart planning and anticipating what's coming next! 

Collect bombs that crush through your targets, or hit extra life points to keep the fun going. Be careful though - newly formed shapes can effectively block your options, and if a fired bullet goes back behind the line of your cannon, you'll lose one life! Decide whether it's worth risking a tricky shot to collect a helpful power-up before it disappears, or choose a safer option.

• Enjoy easy to understand, yet skill based gameplay
• Collect useful power-ups to help you in your struggles
• Top your scores in the leaderboards
• Admire hand-drawn graphics and cool sound effects
